item.title: Need some more help.=P
item.dc:creator: @The_Lord The Lord
item.description:
@The_Lord wrote:

Well you have to add jad to to what he hits lol.

                                               if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == JADSID) {// jad
                                               p.stillgfx(0, p.absY, p.absX);
                                               hitDiff = misc.random(55);
                                               }

Il give I.E for pking delay on runes, how it looks like:
Note* This requires runes and levels!

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 94)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 4); 
deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;  
startAnimation(1979);
highalch(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0, Lockon);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 10;
sendMessage("You poison the enemy!");
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
}
}

item.title: Need some more help.=P
item.dc:creator: @The_Lord The Lord
item.description:
@The_Lord wrote:

Weapons is weapondelay, spells are pkingdelay, and jad read this tut:

Purpose: Said in the title.

Difficulty: 3/10

Assumed Knowledge: Just to copy and paste and remember how to do it

Server Base: I used Pimp (Very advanced version)

Classes Modified: NpcHandler

Step 1: [i]Open Npchandler and search for

				} else if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == false && npcs[i].IsUnderAttack == true) {

Step 2: [i]Scroll 1 more line down and add your npc id in there. Mine looks like this

                                                if(npcs[i].npcType == 1643 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246 || npcs[i].npcType == 1159 || npcs[i].npcType == 54 || npcs[i].npcType == 3201 || npcs[i].npcType == 1615 || npcs[i].npcType == 1610 || npcs[i].npcType == 1620 || npcs[i].npcType == 1633 || npcs[i].npcType == 1612 || npcs[i].npcType == 54 || npcs[i].npcType == 53 || npcs[i].npcType == 55 || npcs[i].npcType == 941 || npcs[i].npcType == 110 || npcs[i].npcType == 82 || npcs[i].npcType == 1593 || npcs[i].npcType == 1590 || npcs[i].npcType == 1591 || npcs[i].npcType == 1592 || npcs[i].npcType == 2026 || npcs[i].npcType == 2027 || npcs[i].npcType == 2028 || npcs[i].npcType == 2029 || npcs[i].npcType == 2030 || npcs[i].npcType == 11)

Step 3: [i]Next, Search for something in this

int hitDiff = 0; //hitDiff = misc.random(npcs[NPCID].MaxHit); if (npcs[NPCID].actionTimer == 0) { if (RingOfLife == true && EnemyHP <= (int)((double)((double)EnemyMaxHP / 10.0) + 0.5)) { server.playerHandler.players[Player].SafeMyLife = true; } else { if (server.playerHandler.players[Player].IsDead == true) { ResetAttackPlayer(NPCID); } else {
A bit below it, mine looks like this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2025) {// Ahrim hitDiff = misc.random(21); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) {// Dharok hitDiff = misc.random(59); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2030) {// Verac hitDiff = misc.random(23); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2027) {// Guthan hitDiff = misc.random(26); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2028) {// Karil hitDiff = misc.random(18); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2029) {// Torag hitDiff = misc.random(20); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) {// Jad hitDiff = misc.random(91); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1643) {// Infernal Mage p.stillgfx(369, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(35); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1612) {// Banshee hitDiff = misc.random(6); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3201) {// Killerwatt p.stillgfx(76, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(27); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1620) {// Cockatrice p.stillgfx(341, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(13); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1633) {// Pyrefiend p.stillgfx(453, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(19); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1610) {// Gargoyle hitDiff = misc.random(51); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) {// Abyssal Demon hitDiff = misc.random(66); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1593) {// Wild Dog hitDiff = misc.random(16); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 82) {// Lesser Demon hitDiff = misc.random(29); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 110) {// Fire Giant hitDiff = misc.random(32); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941) {// Green Dragon p.stillgfx(394, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(37); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55) {// Blue Dragon p.stillgfx(396, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(41); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53) {// Red Dragon p.stillgfx(393, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(44); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) {// Black Dragon p.stillgfx(395, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(48); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1590) {// Bronze Dragon p.stillgfx(1, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(50); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1591) {// Iron Dragon p.stillgfx(1, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(53); } if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1592) {// Steel Dragon p.stillgfx(0, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(55); }

Step 4: Here is one of them

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1643) {// Infernal Mage p.stillgfx(369, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = misc.random(35); }

[ul][li]1643 is the NpcID[/li]
[li]misc.random(35); mean that the monster’s max hit is 35 but it could hit anywhere in between there.[/li]
[li]And on a few of mine i have ‘p.stillgfx(369, p.absY, p.absX);’, this means that, in this case you will be frozen with ice barrage when he attacks you because the number 369 in this case is ice barrage emote.[/ul]

[code]if (actionAmount > 1) {

                    PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" is a stupid noob that is massing!";
		txt4 = "I'm an ugly noob that masses! And gonna get banned if I

mass more!";
string4UpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“Don’t mass you stupid noob!”);
}[/code]
